section.title: Description
section.p: DEALLOCATE is used to deallocate a previously prepared SQL statement. If you do not explicitly deallocate a prepared statement, it is deallocated when the session ends.
For more information on prepared statements, see .

plentry.pd: Optional key word which is ignored.
The name of the prepared statement to deallocate.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: The SQL standard includes a DEALLOCATE statement, but it is only for use in embedded SQL.
